Class FilteredImage

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cs495.engine.gfx.obj.Image
      • edu.cs495.engine.gfx.obj.FilteredImage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Renderable

    public class FilteredImage
extends Image
implements Renderable
    An Image graphics object which supports filters
    Version:
    February 2019
    Author:
    Spencer Imbleau
    See Also:
    AbstractFilter
